extendedInfo.description: Play PERCS Catch. Get PERC Points.You've seen the Personalized Network in C Spire commercials, now you can see it in your world. With PERCS Catch, the new Augmented Reality game from C Spire, you can use your phone to actually see the Personalized Network around you.It's easy: Hold your phone in a landscape position and catch the lights by moving the jar in a quick upward motion and bumping the bright clumps of data lights.  When the lights land in the jar, you'll be able to redeem your points by logging in.Keep your eyes open. The PERCS Catch network lights will also appear in C Spire TV commercials, online or in the newspaper. Scan those lights to get big PERC Points.With C Spire, the network comes to you. Thatâs Personalized Wireless.Watch for more Augmented Reality apps coming soon from C Spire.

reviews.title: Scam.
reviews.comment: Points don\'t multiply. I can NOT scan the bonus and get 10-150 points. When i scan, im told im receiving a 150x. But I catch a 150 and only receive 150. I should receive 150 x 150= 22500.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: The instructions r not easy 2 follow. Utube was a great help. Need more details on scanning for points.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great when it works...
reviews.comment: I play everyday, but several times a week, my points don\'t get credited to my account and of course it won\'t let me play more than once a day to try to get credit :(
reviews.author: Shannon Young

reviews.title: SUCKS!
reviews.comment: Force closes everytime I click \"play\". :/ Id loveeeee for it to be fixed pretty please!  motorola milestone x2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This has horrible instructions. And absolutely nothing works. I would love to get points, but it SUCKS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: -5 stars.  Horrible.
reviews.comment: Game crashes.  Percs are a joke. 500 points are all you can earn a month. To earn a $25 discount on a new phone you need to play at least 5 times a month for 18 months.  To earn enough for $100 off you need to play for 64 months.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works amazingly. Catching lights was easy; just a matter of bumping the lights by pushing the jar into them with a flick. Playing games and earning points is a great combination.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Young lord
reviews.comment: Works great and love it. Me and my wife use it every day its a easy way to get points.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool, but...
reviews.comment: The game does occasionally freeze and the instructions aren\'t very clear. You kind of have to figure it out on your own. But considering that it\'s all free, it\'s pretty great. I\'m pretty sure other providers don\'t have services like this.
reviews.author: Abbie T

reviews.title: Points Missing
reviews.comment: App was working great and now none of my points are showing up since July 10th. Hope it works soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work..
reviews.comment: This app has only worked once since I installed it.. deleted.. just a waste of memory..
reviews.author: Jason myers

reviews.title: So So
reviews.comment: I love getting pointa but I\'ve played 10 times and can\'t get anything! I\'d rather it be something you actually play than just a random chance of getting points
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: Can\'t even trust an app from my provider. 1. Wouldn\'t let me login to claim my points. 2. Didn\'t get my points. 3. It rebooted my phone. 4 After reboot, nothing worked. I had to reboot myself. Unimstalling this poc app.
reviews.author: Amy Garrett

reviews.title: If possible 0 stars
reviews.comment: This app is a bunch of crap. I would catch stars, then everytime I try login I get a message saying can\'t be logged in at this time. I called c.spire who said they would add my points to my account which was a lie. #DELETE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing Points
reviews.comment: I would give it a 5 star, but my points from today didn\'t add with my other points. If this continues to be a problem, its really not worth playing anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Msippie
reviews.comment: Just love this app,  and it gives you points fast on my cspire acct.  Hopefully I will remember to do it everyday
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need fixing
reviews.comment: Points do not go to website all the time(need fixing). Also need a place on the app where it tell you how many points you have all together.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: It needs an exit button, and you should be able to play more than once a day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Percs
reviews.comment: Only thing I find that bothers me with this app is a lot of the time it don\'t add my points, sometimes a week or two at a time. Bt I still continue hoping that I\'m not losing any points. I love it!!
reviews.author: Tonya Bramlett

reviews.title: This is sad
reviews.comment: Not only do are we being forced to all of a sudden pay for streaming and data but this game force closes so much...especially when you catch alot smh. It should at least count toward meaningful phone bill discounts. I hope the force close issue at least gets fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User
